scenes.title: Hook
scenes.text: You're not lazy. Your brain just hates starting.
scenes.visual: Bold text with brain icon, quick zoom

scenes.title: The Problem
scenes.text: The hardest part of any task isn't doing it. It's starting. Your brain sees the whole mountain and freezes.

scenes.title: The 2-Minute Rule
scenes.text: Here's the fix: The Two Minute Rule. If something takes less than two minutes, do it now. If it's bigger, just commit to two minutes.

scenes.title: Takeaway
scenes.text: Two minutes is all it takes to beat resistance. Start small. Start now.
